name: Flambo's Inferno
storyline: Flame Princess left some coal out for Flambo, but Magic Man spread them all over. Flambo now must grab as much coal as he can and escape before the whole place burns down!
summary: Flambo's coal is scattered everywhere and it's the fault of the evil Mage. Guide Flambo through each of these fire levels at a brisk pace, remembering that while it can withstand the heat, it is vulnerable to the slightest drop of water. Collect all the coal pieces to earn a diamond that can be spent on cool clothes and hats for Flambo. You can even try to build your own level!
